name: speedload
others_no_arg: $n speedloads a new clip into $s sidearm.
others_found: $n eyes $N, loading a fresh clip into $s gun... what the hell is going on here?
target_found: $n slowly loads new bullets into $s gun... you feel endangered somehow...
others_auto: $n reloads $s gun, glancing around like a paranoid lunatic...
